content:
This is still a draft, but I would like to get some feedback whether the definitions all look fine to you.
I think another big issue is naming the things the correct way, so I would like to get some suggestions. Maybe weak_topology_bilin for the type alias with the bilinear form, weak_dual and weak_space for the weak-star and weak topology, respectively?
@Heather Macbeth @Kalle Kytölä
:ping_pong: I changed the names slightly from what I suggested above.
